paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

patients.phenotype: breast cancer, ovarian cancer, and HBOC

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The Brazilian carriers for the 29 shared BRCA PVs were residents in 13 of the 26 States and 1 Federal District of Brazil.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with a significant increase in breast cancer risk.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical data.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is one of the Portuguese founder variants.
key_quotes: Of the 556 BRCA PV carriers identified in the 11,482 cancer patients, 331(59.5%) were the carriers for the three founder variants, including 249 (44.8%) carriers of BRCA2 c.156_157insAlu.

tables_processed.table_caption: Clinical classification of the BRCA variants

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
